Regulation Name(s): Fully Automated Short-Term Incubation Cycle Antimicrobial Susceptibility System
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Automated microdilution minimum inhibitory concentration (MIC) assay
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VITEK® 2 AST Gram-Positive Telavancin automated antimicrobial susceptibility test card for Gram positive bacteria
Indications for Use Summary: For in vitro antimicrobial susceptibility testing of Gram positive microorganisms using VITEK® 2 and VITEK® 2 Compact Systems, aiding determination of susceptibility to Telavancin including Staphylococcus aureus and Enterococcus faecalis (vancomycin-susceptible isolates only)
